data.eml:eml: New species of the Rhinella crucifer group (Anura, Bufonidae) from the Brazilian Cerrado

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vaz-Silva, Wilian, Valdujo, Paula Hanna, Pombal, José P. (2012): New species of the Rhinella crucifer group (Anura, Bufonidae) from the Brazilian Cerrado. Zootaxa 3265: 57-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212911
